about_the_game:
As a hardcore tower defense enthusiast, I set out to create a non-traditional roguelike tower defense game. Endless Tower Defense: Survive is a game I developed over two months using the 『CliCli』. If you're interested in discussing, providing feedback, or just having a laugh, feel free to join our QQ group: 907832371.

Intense Mowing Action, Ultimate Stress Relief

No need for rapid operations – just click to enjoy the idle roguelike fun. Face endless waves of monsters, equip weapons, upgrade the tower soul to harvest the horde, and gather resources to upgrade your tower and soul. Dual-wield your tower and soul to defeat bosses and experience the ultimate thrill of endless mowing.

Variety and Depth, Never Gets Boring

With nearly a hundred unique weapons and upgrade effects, enjoy the thrill of mowing down enemies while stacking top-tier roguelike experiences, ensuring each battle delivers double the excitement. Balance your weapon combinations and upgrade effects to optimize offense and defense, allowing for infinite mowing and stress relief.

Tower and Soul Synergy, United We Stand

Explore the abyss to gather soul stones and enhance your tower soul for combat assistance. Whether dual-wielding with separate attack paths or merging them into the ultimate defense tower, you'll experience the ultimate mowing thrill.

Adapt and Conquer, Master the Elements

Against different enemies, remember the counter rules: Metal crushes medium armor; Piercing counters light armor; Magic defeats heavy armor; Siege breaks reinforced armor; Chaos weapons treat all equally, ignoring armor! Use the right weapon to mow down enemies faster and more efficiently!

name: Endless Defense: Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 | AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:

short_description: This is a innovative roguelike TD game made with the 『CliCli』. No need for path planning or tower combos—just one tower! With almost 100 weapons, you’ll be mowing down foes and dominating the battlefield. Enjoy the rush and let off some steam!
